const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const typeorm_1 = require("@nestjs/typeorm");
const typeorm_2 = require("typeorm");
const article_image_entity_1 = require("./entities/article-image.entity");
const AWS = require("aws-sdk");
const config_1 = require("@nestjs/config");
let ArticleImagesService = class ArticleImagesService {
    constructor(repository, configService) {
        this.repository = repository;
        this.configService = configService;
    }
    create(createArticleImageDto) {
        return this.repository.save(this.repository.create(createArticleImageDto));
    }
    findAll(articleId) {
        const images = this.repository
            .createQueryBuilder('articleImage')
            .where('articleImage.articleId = :articleId', { articleId: articleId })
            .select(['articleImage'])
            .getMany();
        return images;
    }
    findOne(id) {
        return `This action returns a #${id} articleImage`;
    }
    update(id, updateArticleImageDto) {
        return this.repository.save(this.repository.create(Object.assign({ id }, updateArticleImageDto)));
    }
    remove(id) {
        const image = this.repository.softDelete({
            id: id,
        });
        return this.repository.softDelete({ id });
    }
    async removeMany(ids) {
        const idsString = ids.map((id) => id.toString());
        const images = await this.repository
            .createQueryBuilder('articleImage')
            .softDelete()
            .from('articleImage')
            .where('id In(:id)', {
            id: idsString,
        })
            .execute();
        return images;
    }
    async removePeriodically() {
        const deletedAtThreshold = new Date();
        deletedAtThreshold.setDate(deletedAtThreshold.getDate() - 7);
        console.log('deletedAtThreshold', deletedAtThreshold);
        const images = await this.repository
            .createQueryBuilder('articleImage')
            .withDeleted()
            .where('articleImage.deletedAt < :threshold', {
            threshold: deletedAtThreshold,
        })
            .getMany();
        for (let image of images) {
            const key = image.url.split('/').pop();
            console.log('key', key);
            const s3 = new AWS.S3();
            const deleteParams = {
                Bucket: this.configService.get('file.awsDefaultS3Bucket'),
                Key: key,
            };
            await s3.deleteObject(deleteParams).promise();
            const deleteResult = await this.repository
                .createQueryBuilder('articleImage')
                .delete()
                .from('articleImage')
                .where('id = :id', {
                id: image.id,
            })
                .execute();
        }
        return images;
    }
};
ArticleImagesService = __decorate([
    (0, common_1.Injectable)(),
    __param(0, (0, typeorm_1.InjectRepository)(article_image_entity_1.ArticleImage)),
    __metadata("design:paramtypes", [typeorm_2.Repository,
        config_1.ConfigService])
], ArticleImagesService);
exports.ArticleImagesService = ArticleImagesService;
